curam.util.connectors.mqseries
Class MQFieldMetadata

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.connectors.mqseries.MQFieldMetadata

public class MQFieldMetadata
extends java.lang.Object

Contains field meta data to determine how the field should be mapped to/from an MQSeries message.

Constructor Summary
MQFieldMetadata(java.lang.Class<?> convertorClassType)
          Constructs a MQFieldMetadata given the type of a converter class.
MQFieldMetadata(java.lang.Class<?> convertorClassType, int fieldWidth)
          Constructs a MQFieldMetadata given the type of a converter class and the width of the string that the field should be encoded into.
MQFieldMetadata(java.lang.String fieldName, int fieldWidth, java.lang.String convertorClassName)
          Constructs a MQFieldMetadata given the type of a converter class, the width of the string that the field should be encoded into and the name of the class which implements the conversions.
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getConvertorClassName()
          Gets the name of the converter class for the field.
 java.lang.String getFieldName()
          Gets the name of the field that this meta data is associated with.
 int getFieldWidth()
          Gets the width of the string that the field should be encoded into.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

MQFieldMetadata

public MQFieldMetadata(java.lang.Class<?> convertorClassType)
Constructs a MQFieldMetadata given the type of a converter class.

Parameters:
convertorClassType - The class type of the converter class.

MQFieldMetadata

public MQFieldMetadata(java.lang.Class<?> convertorClassType,
                       int fieldWidth)
Constructs a MQFieldMetadata given the type of a converter class and the width of the string that the field should be encoded into.

Parameters:
convertorClassType - The class type of the converter class.
fieldWidth - The width required for the field when encoded.

MQFieldMetadata

public MQFieldMetadata(java.lang.String fieldName,
                       int fieldWidth,
                       java.lang.String convertorClassName)
Constructs a MQFieldMetadata given the type of a converter class, the width of the string that the field should be encoded into and the name of the class which implements the conversions.

Parameters:
fieldName - The name of the field to which the meta data applies
fieldWidth - The width of this field when encoded in the message
convertorClassName - The name of an MQFieldMapper class which should be used to convert this field.
Method Detail

getConvertorClassName

public java.lang.String getConvertorClassName()
Gets the name of the converter class for the field.

Returns:
A String specifying the name of the converter class - which may be null.

getFieldName

public java.lang.String getFieldName()
Gets the name of the field that this meta data is associated with. Every MQFieldMetadata object is associated with an attribute of a struct.

Returns:
A String specifying the name of the struct field that this meta data belongs to.

getFieldWidth

public int getFieldWidth()
Gets the width of the string that the field should be encoded into.

Returns:
The width of the encoded version of the field.
